1.title: Solomon's Prayer and Wealth
1.keyEvent: Solomon prays for wisdom; receives wealth and honor

2.title: Preparations for the Temple
2.keyEvent: Solomon organizes labor and materials for temple building

3.title: Temple Foundation Laid
3.keyEvent: Solomon begins building the temple; priests consecrated

4.title: Temple Furnishings Made
4.keyEvent: Craftsmen make temple furnishings and Solomon's palace

5.title: Ark Brought to Temple
5.keyEvent: Preparations to bring the ark into the temple

6.title: Temple Completed and Dedicated
6.keyEvent: Solomon finishes and dedicates the temple to God

7.title: Solomon's Palace and Wisdom
7.keyEvent: Solomon builds his palace and exhibits great wisdom

8.title: Solomon's Reign and Prosperity
8.keyEvent: Solomon rules Israel with wisdom and peace

9.title: Hiram's Tribute and Solomon's Glory
9.keyEvent: Hiram sends tribute; Solomon's fame spreads

10.title: Queen of Sheba's Visit
10.keyEvent: Queen of Sheba visits Solomon, impressed by wisdom

12.title: Kingdom Divides
12.keyEvent: Ten tribes rebel; Jeroboam rules Israel

13.title: Abijah's War with Jeroboam
13.keyEvent: King Abijah defeats Jeroboam in battle

14.title: Asa's Reign and Reforms
14.keyEvent: Asa strengthens Judah and removes idolatry

15.title: Azariah's Prophecy to Asa
15.keyEvent: Prophet Azariah encourages Asa to seek God

16.title: Asa's Later Reign and Trouble
16.keyEvent: Asa faces war and relies on foreign help

17.title: Jehoshaphat's Reign and Reforms
17.keyEvent: Jehoshaphat strengthens Judah and promotes justice

18.title: Alliance with Ahab
18.keyEvent: Jehoshaphat allies with Ahab; battle against Aram

19.title: Jehoshaphat's Judicial Reforms
19.keyEvent: Jehoshaphat appoints judges and promotes justice

20.title: Jehoshaphat's Victory Over Moabites
20.keyEvent: Jehoshaphat prays; God delivers Judah from enemies

21.title: Jehoram's Evil Reign
21.keyEvent: Jehoram rules Judah, leads people into idolatry

22.title: Ahaziah's Short Reign
22.keyEvent: Ahaziah reigns briefly; allied with Israel's Ahab

23.title: Joash Becomes King
23.keyEvent: Joash crowned king; temple repairs begin

24.title: Joash's Reign and Death
24.keyEvent: Joash reigns; temple restored; killed by servants

25.title: Amaziah's Reign and Defeat
25.keyEvent: Amaziah defeats Edom; later defeated by Israel

26.title: Uzziah's Prosperous Reign
26.keyEvent: Uzziah reigns long; grows strong but punished for pride

27.title: Jotham's Reign
27.keyEvent: Jotham rules Judah; prospers and builds cities

28.title: Ahaz's Wicked Reign
28.keyEvent: Ahaz leads Judah into idolatry and war

29.title: Hezekiah Restores the Temple
29.keyEvent: Hezekiah repairs and sanctifies the temple

30.title: Passover Celebrated
30.keyEvent: Hezekiah leads Judah in celebrating Passover

31.title: Temple Offerings Restored
31.keyEvent: Hezekiah organizes temple offerings and tithes

32.title: Hezekiah's Deliverance
32.keyEvent: Hezekiah trusts God; Jerusalem saved from Assyria

33.title: Manasseh's Reign and Repentance
33.keyEvent: Manasseh's evil reign; repents and restores worship

34.title: Josiah's Reforms
34.keyEvent: Josiah repairs temple; finds the Book of the Law

35.title: Passover Under Josiah
35.keyEvent: Josiah celebrates Passover; leads nation in revival
